code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Detail(){const{id}=useParams();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[movies,setMovies]=useState([]);const getMovie=async()=>{const json=await(await fetch("https://yts.mx/api/v2/movie_details.json?movie_id=".concat(id))).json();setMovies(json.data.movie);setLoading(false);};useEffect(()=>{getMovie();});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading...."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movies.medium_cover_image,alt:movies.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:movies.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:movies.description_full?movies.description_full:"undifined"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:movies.genres.map(g=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:g},g))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{})]})});}export default Detail;
